identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a unique, organic, and trustworthy interface for Indian farmers to detect plant diseases.

primary.name: Deep Forest Green
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key branding elements

colors.theme_strategy: Light mode default. High contrast for outdoor visibility. Dark mode optional but secondary.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients for hero sections: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/10 via-background to-secondary/10'
visual_enhancers.textures: Add subtle noise texture to background for organic feel

hero.alt: Indian farmer using phone in field

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text on primary buttons is white. Ensure text on background is dark grey.
accessibility.aria_labels: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a mobile-first PWA. Prioritize touch targets (min 44px). Use the 'Organic & Earthy' theme. Do not use default Shadcn styles; override them with the radius and colors defined here.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_strategy: Use a bottom navigation bar for the main app shell. The 'Scan' button should be a prominent Floating Action Button (FAB) in the center of the bottom nav.
instructions_to_main_agent.chat_interface: The chat interface should feel like WhatsApp or Telegram but cleaner. Use distinct bubbles: Green for User, White for AI. Add a 'Upload Image' button inside the chat input area.
instructions_to_main_agent.results_page: When a disease is detected, show a 'Diagnosis Card' with the disease name in Red/Terracotta and a confidence score. Below it, show 'Treatment Steps' as a checklist.
instructions_to_main_agent.tech_stack: React (JS), Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion (for transitions), Lucide React (icons), Shadcn UI (components).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
